Sludge:

Sludge slowly walked towards the ship.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Grimlock scowled back at Pacifix, hate burning in his red optics.
> Ironhide knew that look, and couldnt have them coming to blows.
> "Grimlock, stand down. Get on the ship, or we will leave you 
behind." he
> threatened. Grimlock turned his harsh gaze to Ironhide. "Without
> Dinobots, they die on earth." He whispered, and walked towards the 
ship.
> "Come Swoop, Sludge. We go." he commanded.
